Description: Body and handle sherd of large Chian, possibly Wild Goat Style, pottery chalice; white slip; interior: glazed streaky black with two added white bands and one added red band; exterior: glazed streaky brown on handle and part of handle frill pattern; interior and underside of handle reserved.
Curator's comments: For parallels, see Lemos no. 115 from Emporio.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0191) (phase 2)
